title: "Interaction of surface pattern and contour shape in the tilt after effects evoked by symmetry"
excerpt: "Integration of multiple properties of an object is a fundamental function of the visual cortex in object recognition. For instance, surface patterns and contour shapes are thought to be crucial characteristics that jointly contribute to recognition."
